LED Tubes for Lighting Signs

Make your signs shine brighter with high-performance LED sign lighting tubes. Replace inefficient fluorescent tubes with these energy-saving LED alternatives and elevate the visibility and impact of your message.

4ft LED Tube Lights

Our 4ft LED tube lights provide exceptional performance and energy efficiency, making them an excellent alternative to traditional fluorescent tubes. With their superior lighting output and extended lifespan, you can enjoy bright, consistent illumination while reducing energy consumption and maintenance costs.

Looking to replace your 4ft fluorescent tubes with LED?

You've come to the right place. Our LED tube lights are designed as direct replacements for fluorescent tubes, making the transition simple and hassle-free. ELEDLights supplies a wide range of LED 4ft tube lights, from replacements that can offer the same brightness as your current lighting at half the energy cost to brilliant, ultra-high-lumen 4ft LED light tubes that can be used for high-ceiling applications.

Wondering is it worth replacing your fluorescent tubes with LED?

It absolutely is! Upgrading to LED 4ft tube lights is a smart investment in the long run. Not only will you enjoy significant energy savings and enjoy reduced maintenance costs due to the extended lifespan of LED lights, but you will also be eligible for utility rebates.

Interested in learning how to convert your 4ft fluorescent lighting to LED?

It's easier than you think. Our 4ft LED tube lights are designed to be compatible with most existing fixtures, allowing for a seamless conversion process. The most popular installation style for LED 4ft tube lights is the ballast-bypass/Type B LED light tube, which has the advantage of eliminating your fixture's ballast from the equation for max energy reduction. These are available with either single-ended power or double-ended power. Or you can select a dual mode 4ft LED light tube that can be installed as either ballast bypass or ballast compatible.

Whichever LED 4 foot tube lights you choose, you'll get high quality lighting with a 5-year warranty that's backed by ELEDLights' responsive customer support team.

At ELEDLights, we understand the importance of quality and reliability. That's why we only source our LED tube lights from trusted manufacturers who prioritize durability and performance. Our products are built to last, ensuring years of reliable lighting without the need for frequent replacements.

Explore our collection to find the perfect LED tube lights for your lighting project. If you have any questions or need assistance with your LED lighting upgrade, don't hesitate to reach out.
